text: The fact that you can only get the money in increments then charged fees on top of each transactions, I think is a bit much. But it's a convenience.
title: The fact that you can only get the…

reply.message: We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: This loan service is very easy to set up and keeps you from borrowing ridiculous amounts of money so as to not sink you into a huge hole. You can also borrow money back to back instead waiting 1-3 days like many other apps. That being said the fees are a few dollars more than I like. It’s 4.99 to get the money quickly and they say the tipping is optional but then tells you you need to tip the next time. I get needing to keep the service up and running but it could just be mandatory like the 4.99 fee to get the money quicker. Besides that one gripe I really like the app on pretty much ease alone.
title: Easy to use with fees for a little less

reply.message: Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesn’t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip — thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash advance to many, many folks like you!

title: Loan

reply.message: Hi there, Pablo. Thank you so much for this awesome 5-star review! We're happy to know that our products and services were able to provide assistance to you! It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! Additionally, after you unlock Instacash, the exact amount you have available each Instacash cycle (typically time with your pay cycle) will be based on factors in your linked checking account, primarily whether we can detect recent qualifying income and are able to predict when you'll be able to repay your Instacash. If we detect recent qualifying income, you'll have access to up to $200 depending on the income amount. If we can't, you'll have access to a lower amount but not less than $25. In other words, as your linked checking account's financial factors change (such as an increase, decrease, or change in the regularity of in detectable income), your Instacash limit may go up and down between $25 and $200 accordingly. reply.message: Hi there, Elizabeth. Thank you for this review! We're happy to know that our products and services were able to provide assistance to you! Additionally, we want to inform you that with 0% APR InstaCash, you can spot yourself some cash anytime. How soon you can get your funds depends on the delivery method you choose and whether you're sending the funds to your RoarMoney account. We offer turbo delivery options to your RoarMoney or external account for a small fee of $3.99 - $4.99 so that you may receive your funds instantly. Alternatively, we offer free delivery options within 24-48 hours to your RoarMoney account or 3-5 business days to an external account. Tips are also optional, and do not impact eligibility or availability whatsoever. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. However, we encourage you support the community and we highly appreciate it! You see, it takes a big team here at MoneyLion to keep 0% APR Instacash running smoothly 24/7. reply.message: Hi there, Craig. Thank you so much for this awesome 5-star review! We're happy to know that our products and services were able to provide assistance to you! It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! Additionally, regarding our Credit Builder Plus loan, there’s no credit check to apply and you don’t need good credit to be eligible. You can even apply if you don’t have any credit history at all. To get started, just link your primary checking account, and we’ll securely scan your finances to see if you qualify. The account you link must meet the following criteria: A checking or spending account in good standing (at MoneyLion’s discretion) with a detectable income stream (i.e. it’s where you deposit your paychecks/salary/benefits checks). Savings and money market accounts will not qualify, the account has been open for at least 60 days, and the account demonstrates an acceptable balance and active transaction history (at MoneyLion’s discretion). Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!
